description: This header file declares the interface functions for the SSP message bus in a component of the RDK-based software. It includes function prototypes for engaging the message bus, initializing, finalizing, checking the bus, and freeing resources. The file contains licensing information and include guards.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages and initializes the message bus component with specified component ID, configuration file, and path.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the message bus interface with user-specific data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes and cleans up resources for the message bus interface.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Performs a check or verification of the message bus status.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources associated with the message bus, given a priority level and user data.
